msItem.note: The reference list mentions: Large Arabic Document; but we there are two papyri under this number (5558(1) and 5558(2)). Edition's Side A is Recto; Side B Verso according to APIS guidelines.

condition.ab: Light brown papyrus written with a thin pen in black ink perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The original cutting lines are partially preserved on all four sides. The left bottom corner is broken off resulting in the loss of seven to nine letters in the seven bottom lines. The right bottom corner is broken off but has caused no damage to the text. There are some holes in the papyrus due to wear which have resulted in some damage to the text.

handDesc.p: There are a few diacritical dots and one unconventional ligature (l. 5 alla).
